channel.title: vim on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in vim on Ross A. Baker

item.description: The violin soloist gets to tour with their favorite Italian instrument from Sixteen Dickety-Two, but the piano soloist has to play whatever's there. I like to imagine violinists maintain elaborate Emacs configs, and pianists run Vim with no config because "it's installed everywhere." #ClassicalMusic #Emacs #Vim
